meanings.definition: To transfer data from a computer to a central server.
meanings.sent1: She uploads her photos to the cloud every evening.
meanings.sent2: He uploads his documents to the shared drive for everyone to access.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to upload its meows to the internet, thinking it was a singer.
meanings.sent4: His laughter uploads joy to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The sun uploads warmth to the earth, making everything cozy.

meanings.definition: The act of transferring data from a computer to a central server.
meanings.sent1: The uploads of the new software took longer than expected.
meanings.sent2: I checked the server for any recent uploads of important files.
meanings.sent3: The uploads of cat videos made the internet a happier place.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an upload of positivity in the room.
meanings.sent5: The uploads of knowledge from the internet expanded his understanding.
